apiClassifier.shortdesc: A simple extension of an image, inmplementing the selectable idea.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: A simple extension of an image, inmplementing the selectable idea. This image can be uses with others to simulate an image based single- or multiple choice construct.

apiValue.shortdesc: Video and player controls are clipped if they exceed the size of the component, but the drop shadow above is not clipped and sizes to the component.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Video and player controls are clipped if they exceed the size of the component, but the drop shadow above is not clipped and sizes to the component. We also set verticalScrollPosition so that when we do clip, rather than clipping off the bottom first, we clip off the top fist. This is so the player controls are still visible when we start clipping.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Defines the minimal criteria for a class to be a module.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Defines the minimal criteria for a class to be a module. This makes it possible for the MainAppManager to load any Module with the same abstract sequence of instructions.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns a String of the module class plus the package name.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns a String of the module class plus the package name. Ensure to change their names, when refactor.

apiOperation.shortdesc:
Loading the module.
Connect the modules internal variables with data from GlobalSettings, TestCollections and Session.

apiDesc.p: Connect the modules internal variables with data from GlobalSettings, TestCollections and Session. Usually there are only some of them needed, so not all the modules will behave like in the following description.
loads debug states, url paths to data on the server, and text for labels from globalsettings
loads the collection of possible dimensions, levels and the associated items as Strings
loads actual session states. These can include actual dimension, actual level and actual item.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Event const cannot be accessed via get, therefore we use this method, to enable addEventListener(anyModuleInstance.returnLoadFinishedEvent())

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Event const cannot be accessed via get, therefore we use this method, to enable addEventListener(anyModuleInstance.returnLoadFinishedEvent())

apiOperation.shortdesc: Event const cannot be accessed via get, therefore we use this method, to enable addEventListener(anyModuleInstance.returnModuleFinishedEvent())

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Event const cannot be accessed via get, therefore we use this method, to enable addEventListener(anyModuleInstance.returnModuleFinishedEvent())

apiOperation.shortdesc: To access the private view component only via referencs, instead of direct access.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: To access the private view component only via referencs, instead of direct access.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Tells the module, that the screen is visible and specific actions can be performed now.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Tells the module, that the screen is visible and specific actions can be performed now.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Unloads all contained and related objects of a module.

apiDesc.p: Unloads all contained and related objects of a module. Removes all event listeners if possible and sets all objects and relations to null.
Therefore all related objects of a module should be stored in an array calles references.

apiValue.shortdesc: Set the Debugging state to true. Enables to determine errors without sourcecode by showing alertboxes, if an error occurs

apiDesc.p: Set the Debugging state to true.
Enables to determine errors without sourcecode by showing alertboxes, if an error occurs

apiValue.shortdesc: Sets sound to on or off Enables to use application without sound errors, ideal for rapid item development and debug

apiDesc.p: Sets sound to on or off
Enables to use application without sound errors, ideal for rapid item development and debug

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Defines the minimum criteria to be clickable and refer to any object, which many of the buttons need in this app.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
Defines the minimum criteria to be clickable and refer to any object, which many of the buttons need in this app.
There are many different Types of buttons in this application, many of them have refer to a sound and therefore we need to generalize the properties of a button which makes ist possible to play a sound by clickign itr dragging it

apiValue.shortdesc: Get the reference to a specific sound object.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Get the reference to a specific sound object.

apiValue.shortdesc: Get the reference to a specific visible object like an image.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Get the reference to a specific visible object like an image.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: This interface helps to generalize objects, for example stored runtime in an array or so, to call the very helpful removeAllEventListeners function.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
This interface helps to generalize objects, for example stored runtime in an array or so, to call the very helpful removeAllEventListeners function.
It is required to extends Shared.EventDispatcher to implement this interface

apiClassifier.shortdesc: This interface is for accessing information of any selectable component.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
This interface is for accessing information of any selectable component. These components are generally used within questions. It allows the program to iterate the references and look for already selected Objects. Instead of overwriting the synchronize() function in each new question class, you just have to assure it implements this interface.
By using this, it is possible to implement a radio button or check box behavior for an image or other visual components, without extending these classes

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Adds the textvalue to a component.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Adds the textvalue to a component. Makes possible to implement writable components and access them runtime via arrays or lists or other runtime build references.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Represents the process of loading, arrangin and displaying data for a selection of images and a textarea.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Represents the process of loading, arrangin and displaying data for a selection of images and a textarea.

apiParam.apiDesc: the xmllist source file
path to the php script for loading images, mp3 and other data
the equivalent to rooturl

apiOperation.shortdesc: loads all required data, according to a specific questionspage.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
loads all required data, according to a specific questionspage.
Builds questions instruction first
loads images and arranges them in a rectangle shaped group of four images
creates a textinput area next to the images group

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Provides a cloud of radiobuttons and labels to click.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Provides a cloud of radiobuttons and labels to click. The positions within the cloud will be chosen randomly and the cloud can increase its size by having trouble with positioning elements due to limited space.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Representing the process of loading, arranging and displaying data within a single choice item.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Representing the process of loading, arranging and displaying data within a single choice item. The data model is a radiobutton group, whcih allows only one choice per question.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Displays a vertical set of Radiobuttons and Labels according to the specific questionspage, determined by the parameter.

apiParam.apiDesc: the number of the page

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Displays a vertical set of Radiobuttons and Labels according to the specific questionspage, determined by the parameter. Optional there can be an image and or a sound button before the answertext.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Defines the basic structure and bahvior of a question object.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
Defines the basic structure and bahvior of a question object. The detailed behavior like load and display data is defined in each of the extending quesion classes.
A special feature is the load content by page behavior. All Data will be loaded immediately after calling the specific questionspage and will be unloaded by calling another questionpage. This frees memory and enables a fluid application.

apiConstructor.shortdesc: Constructor of each questions object contains a xmlList source (of questions) and the relative url path for loading data.

apiParam.apiDesc: the source xmllist containing the item data, defined in each item xml document
the realtive url the php script which is required to load and store data

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: Constructor of each questions object contains a xmlList source (of questions) and the relative url path for loading data. Also initializes the view component.

apiOperation.shortdesc: iterates the answer array to check if an anser was already given to a specific field.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: iterates the answer array to check if an anser was already given to a specific field. This allows a reload of a previous page with pre-existing answer settings.

apiOperation.shortdesc: This function is the main process for displaying the content.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: This function is the main process for displaying the content. It will vary for each Questionsobject, so it need to be overridden.

apiOperation.shortdesc: returns the answervalue, if value is a string

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: returns the answervalue, if value is a string

apiOperation.shortdesc: checks, if a value in the answer array was already given by comparing the ids.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: checks, if a value in the answer array was already given by comparing the ids.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Because this Class is extending Shared.EventDispatcher, we can check if the listeners array is filled with at least one reference to a listener object.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Because this Class is extending Shared.EventDispatcher, we can check if the listeners array is filled with at least one reference to a listener object. This may be required to check if an object's listener is removable.

apiOperation.shortdesc: initialization of the xmllist content.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: initialization of the xmllist content. Need to be called seperately, because of EventListeners in Parent Object.

apiOperation.shortdesc: This Method loops the reference array, searching for the Radiobutton Reference and get its ID and selection status.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: This Method loops the reference array, searching for the Radiobutton Reference and get its ID and selection status. These information represents the user input and is fundamental for evaluation. Evaluation is always done in ItemObject. The clear screen behavior is not defined here but rather the change of the qpState.

apiOperation.shortdesc: This method is called by event and plays the audio file (MP3Audio), the specific SoundButton is referring to.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: This method is called by event and plays the audio file (MP3Audio), the specific SoundButton is referring to. The reference to the audio file is created in the displayQuestions() method.

apiOperation.shortdesc: This method is like an undo function.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: This method is like an undo function. Important to know: allAnswers.pop() will delete the input on the previous questionpage and substitude it with the new input. The clear screen behavior is not defined here but rather the change of the qpState.

apiOperation.shortdesc: This method initially loops the references Array and checks if the reference has listeners or is a specific object.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: This method initially loops the references Array and checks if the reference has listeners or is a specific object. Listeners will be removed, Objects will be set to null.

apiOperation.shortdesc: This function is required to synchronize the answer arrays with the new answers every time a questionpage was build.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: This function is required to synchronize the answer arrays with the new answers every time a questionpage was build.

apiValue.shortdesc: managing listeners (for parent object)

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: managing listeners (for parent object)

apiValue.shortdesc: Stores the summary of all answers arrays (all answers of all questionpages)

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Stores the summary of all answers arrays (all answers of all questionpages)

apiValue.shortdesc: Stores information about the recent user input, this Array is used temporary for each questionpage.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Stores information about the recent user input, this Array is used temporary for each questionpage.

apiValue.shortdesc: The state of the module.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The state of the module.

apiValue.shortdesc: This States affects only internal processes --> next page / previous page

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: This States affects only internal processes --> next page / previous page

apiValue.shortdesc: stores references to all the question related instances to ensure removing

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: stores references to all the question related instances to ensure removing

apiValue.shortdesc: relative url path for loading data

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: relative url path for loading data

apiValue.shortdesc: xml source data, received from itemObject

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: xml source data, received from itemObject

apiValue.shortdesc: Set the current module state.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Set the current module state. Important for finishing the questions and evaluate the answers in the parent object.

apiValue.shortdesc: Get the current questionspage state.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Get the current questionspage state.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Representing the loading, arranging and displaying data for a cloze text.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Representing the loading, arranging and displaying data for a cloze text.

apiParam.apiDesc: see QuestionsObject
see QuestionsObject
see QuestionsObject

apiOperation.shortdesc: loads the certain data and displays it in a way of a text with empty text areas and soundbuttons.

apiParam.apiDesc: the parameter indicates which questionpage is actually displayed

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
loads the certain data and displays it in a way of a text with empty text areas and soundbuttons.
it uses the modified HorizontalMultilineLayout to arrange the elements in a row
the Text will be completely split up, so every single word as well as the input area is encapsulated by a Group and can be Designed with css properties.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Represents the process of loading, arranging and displaying data within a multiple choice item.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Represents the process of loading, arranging and displaying data within a multiple choice item. The data model is a checkbox group, which allows one or many or all selected choices as an answer.

apiParam.apiDesc: the number of the questionpage. 0 means page 1

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Defines a set of events realted to the item object and its children.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Defines a set of events realted to the item object and its children. Also stores the result xml of the actual item, in order to pass it to other handlers.

apiParam.apiDesc: type the name of the event type, see the event constants
bubbles on or off
cancelable on or off
the dataobject containing the finished item xml, ready to get sent to the server

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Represents a handler for all item releated actions.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Represents a handler for all item releated actions.

apiConstructor.shortdesc: Constructor, will only be used by first instantiation.bla

alias for itemnumber -> combined with relative_url will result in path to item data
user number for writing in user folder and xml

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Like in the most Classes, this class has a load method seperated from the constructor to ensure a successfull event listener setup.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: First module, loaded after initialization of the application.

apiDesc.p: First module, loaded after initialization of the application. Includes a VideoPlayer for introducing the applications funcionalities.

apiValue.shortdesc: The view component, which will be linked to the display.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The view component, which will be linked to the display.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: The core controller class.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: The core controller class. Manages the loading and unloading of the modules as well as the communication between them and the model related data. Modules a loaded by name, their functions are accessed via ICustomModule interface. The view component of the modules get connected with the DisplayManager

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns a reference to the view component, owned by the current module instance.

apiReturn.apiDesc: Object view object, usually a group based mxml component

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns a reference to the view component, owned by the current module instance.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Sends to the module instance, that the display tween is finished.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Sends to the module instance, that the display tween is finished. This ensures a delay of starting animations or scripts until the new screen is visible.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: After finishing a test, this Class is loaded to provide functions for printing the evaluation and choosing the further activities.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: After finishing a test, this Class is loaded to provide functions for printing the evaluation and choosing the further activities.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: The DisplayManager is one of the core classes to provide a management all visual components.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: The DisplayManager is one of the core classes to provide a management all visual components. This allows the MainAppmanager to include or remove specific view components of a module.

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: Constructor, no args. Set the default size of the wrapper.

apiOperation.shortdesc: clears the screen.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: clears the screen.

defined, wether the tween is the title screen or a normal alpha tween

link.linktext: the image which will be faded to alpha 0

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Represents a login form handler.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Represents a login form handler. User input will be sent to the server, server evaluates and answers with a value. The value influences the state of the handler and either a login is performed or fault or a new user code is requestet.

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: constructor. No variables will be pased. Initializes view component.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Extracts the urls and paths from the globals model and prepares the http service for server request.

the testcollection lib object, not used in this class
the session lib object, not used in this class

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: This method starts the http request.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: A static class, representing a sequence to arrange the required modules in a predefined order.

is a parameter which indeicated, that there is still an item in the load queue

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: A class representing one testcollection of a dimension / subject.

asCustoms.soundurl: url to the sound file, related with the description text

description of this collection and level

apiOperation.shortdesc: adds an xmllist of items and excerps the itemnumbers.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: adds an xmllist of items and excerps the itemnumbers. Stored in a common array.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: returns the description text of this collection

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: returns the level of the collection

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: returns the array of items

apiClassifier.shortdesc: This is a Data Structure, where each session for one item is stored.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: This is a Data Structure, where each session for one item is stored. In detail, it stores the slected dimension, level and item. This ensures, that application always knows, where the user is at the moment.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: This class loads the xml with the contained information about subjects, levels and item IDs and parse it into an XMLLIST.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
This class loads the xml with the contained information about subjects, levels and item IDs and parse it into an XMLLIST.
The data is read-only and will be written only once when the class will be initialized
To overwirte the data, the class must be unloaded and be instanciated again

apiConstructor.shortdesc: constructor, immediately initializes http service and loads the testcollection from the related Url

apiParam.apiDesc: the relative path to the xml file on the server, will be combined with the url String

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: constructor, immediately initializes http service and loads the testcollection from the related Url

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns a reference to the data.

apiReturn.apiDesc: XMLList the testcollection data as an XMLList

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns a reference to the data.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns a specific Dimension with all its related levels and items.

apiReturn.apiDesc: if found it returns the appropiate dimension as a Dimension object, if not it returns an empty Dimension object dummy.

apiParam.apiDesc: the number of one of the four possible dimensions. See your testcollection xml to determine which number represents which dimension.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns a specific Dimension with all its related levels and items.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns a specific Dimension with all its related levels and items, determined by its name.

apiReturn.apiDesc: if found it returns the appropiate dimension as a Dimension object, if not it returns an empty Dimension object dummy.

apiParam.apiDesc: the name of one of the four possible dimensions.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns a specific Dimension with all its related levels and items, determined by its name.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns the name of a dimension at a given index.

apiReturn.apiDesc: String the name of the dimension as a String value

apiParam.apiDesc: the specific index of a dimension, ranges within [0..3]

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns the name of a dimension at a given index.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns the name of a level at a given index.

apiReturn.apiDesc: String the name of the level as a String value

apiParam.apiDesc: the specific index of a dimension, ranges within the amount of levels

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns the name of a level at a given index.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Tries to find the item number of the follwer item.

apiReturn.apiDesc: String if found, the next item id as a String, else null

apiParam.apiDesc: the current dimension, usually stored in a session object or sent by a custommodule event
the current level, usually stored in a session object or sent by a custommodule event
the current item, usually stored in a session object or sent by a custommodule event

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Tries to find the item number of the follwer item. If nothing is found, the actual item was the last one within the current level.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: This class represents the login session of a certain user.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: This class represents the login session of a certain user. The information are stored temporarily and usually written in an xml file which will be permanently send to the server.

apiConstructor.shortdesc: Constructor, initializes the URLLoader but does not call its load() function.

apiParam.apiDesc: the include script (php) on the server
the user id from the login
for debugging purposes, opens the navigated url in a new tab or window to enable a view of php echos or error messages

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: Constructor, initializes the URLLoader but does not call its load() function.

apiOperation.shortdesc: First adds variables to the URLLoader to define the parameter for the include script and the Post variable userid then starts the request.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: First adds variables to the URLLoader to define the parameter for the include script and the Post variable userid then starts the request.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Constructs a new entry for the actual Dimension and level, chosen by the user into.

apiParam.apiDesc: An array of all item names within the chosen dimension and level
the chosen dimension or sometimes called subject
the level of difficulty
the directlink to the php script, which will handle the data

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Constructs a new entry for the actual Dimension and level, chosen by the user into. Calls the private updateUserXML(scriptUrl) function, to send the updated xml to php.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Updates a session by adding an entry at the data attribute of the item tag.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Updates a session by adding an entry at the data attribute of the item tag. (After item was completed) The entry consists of the userName, the timestamp and the itemnumber and the ending .xml.
This sequence will also be the name of the immediate path to the completed item xml file, which usually will be placed in the same directory as the user xml file
Calls the private function updateUserXML(scriptUrl) to send the data to the server.

apiValue.shortdesc: returns the userdata as an xml object

asCustoms.returns: user data file as an xml object

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: returns the userdata as an xml object

apiClassifier.shortdesc: This class represents a dimension or subject with all its included data.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: This class represents a dimension or subject with all its included data.

apiOperation.shortdesc: adds a collection object to the collection list.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: adds a collection object to the collection list. useful if once the collection is created out of an xmllist.

apiOperation.shortdesc: adds an xmllist to the collection list.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: adds an xmllist to the collection list. usually a collection is stored as an xml file, so it can be decoded by itering an xmllis.

apiOperation.shortdesc: returns the description of this dimension

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: returns the description of this dimension

apiOperation.shortdesc: returns the name of this dimension

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: returns the name of this dimension

apiOperation.shortdesc: returns the soundurl of this dimension

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: returns the soundurl of this dimension

apiOperation.shortdesc: returns a specific collection by passing an index number as parameter.

apiParam.apiDesc: the index of the desired collection

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: returns a specific collection by passing an index number as parameter.

apiOperation.shortdesc: returns the entire collectionList as an array

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: returns the entire collectionList as an array

apiClassifier.shortdesc: This class is a model for all global settings like paths and labels.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
This class is a model for all global settings like paths and labels.
The globals.xml file will be analysed and the particular data will be stored in different arrays

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: Constructor. Http Service will be set up.

apiOperation.shortdesc: returns a specific label by comparing the id of the path.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: returns a specific label by comparing the id of the path. Usually it will ba an UrlTypeEnum but it can also be any string.

apiOperation.shortdesc: returns a specific path by comparing the id of the path.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: returns a specific path by comparing the id of the path. Usually it will ba an UrlTypeEnum but it can also be any string.

apiValue.shortdesc: returns a boolean value, whether debug is enabled or disabled

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: returns a boolean value, whether debug is enabled or disabled

apiValue.shortdesc: reutns all labels stored in an array

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: reutns all labels stored in an array

apiValue.shortdesc: returns all paths stored in an array

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: returns all paths stored in an array

apiValue.shortdesc: returns a boolean value, whether sound is enabled or disabled

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: returns a boolean value, whether sound is enabled or disabled

apiClassifier.shortdesc: XML writer Class Version: 0.1.2 DOC: 09.11.2010 Author: Jan Kster Last Update: 12.01.2011 Description: Similar to XLoader, this Class is made for connecting to php but sending data instead of retreiving data.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: XML writer Class Version: 0.1.2 DOC: 09.11.2010 Author: Jan Kster Last Update: 12.01.2011 Description: Similar to XLoader, this Class is made for connecting to php but sending data instead of retreiving data.

apiParam.apiDesc: The complete item XML File (required, cannot be null)
The timestamp, given by the itemObject
the complete Document name to be written
the user name / iD (default ID is test)
there are different types of php scripts, whhich can be requested, the parameter indicates which specific script will be called.

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: Constructor with presettings of parameters. The parameters representing the values which are required to make PHP write a new XML document with the correct information.

apiOperation.shortdesc: In this method, a variables object willl be created to store all data in one object.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: In this method, a variables object willl be created to store all data in one object. In php you will be able to refer to it, by accessing the _POST['variables.something'] array. Depending on the param variable, different scripts will be loaded.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Creates a new wrapper for loaded mp3 files.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Creates a new wrapper for loaded mp3 files. Can handle all required events for a common mp3 player like play, pause, stop etc. The underlying data structure is a Sound Object.

apiParam.apiDesc: the path to the include script on the server
the relative path to the mp3 object
allows to set an id for accessing objects at runtime
for debug purposes, navigates to url of the include script

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: Constructor. Requires an url to load an mp3 from an external source. events will be auto-build.

apiOperation.shortdesc: manually pauses the sound object.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: manually pauses the sound object.

apiOperation.shortdesc: opens the soundchannel and adds the playing soundobject to it.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: opens the soundchannel and adds the playing soundobject to it. enabled to autodetect, when the soundobject finished playing. isPlaying will be set to true. Does nothing if the sound object is null. This can happen for example if the unload method was called external or internal when an error occured.

apiOperation.shortdesc: return if the underlying sound object is in playing state

asCustoms.returns: Boolean isPlaying true if playing false if not

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: return if the underlying sound object is in playing state

apiOperation.shortdesc: returns a progress value for external objects to access the loading state of the sound object

asCustoms.returns: Number a percent value as a number

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: returns a progress value for external objects to access the loading state of the sound object

apiOperation.shortdesc: lets an external class set this state to debugMode, allows to show alert boxes on screen

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: lets an external class set this state to debugMode, allows to show alert boxes on screen

apiOperation.shortdesc: stops a sound.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: stops a sound.

apiOperation.shortdesc: unloads soundObject related events and the object itself.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: unloads soundObject related events and the object itself.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Static class.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Static class. Prepares a custom error type to be send to server which writes an error log

apiOperation.shortdesc: creates an sends a new error message by combining the parameters and adding a timestamp.

apiParam.apiDesc: custom number of error type
custom description of error type
original falsh error id
the source of the error
the module and if important also the line (line is usually useless, due to continual development)
the url to the php script
for debugging, shows the target url

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: creates an sends a new error message by combining the parameters and adding a timestamp. Then a urlloader will be created to request the specific php script which will write the message into a log file.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Lays out elements the same way as text area positions words: putting them in one line and going to next line when there is no space for new word.

asCustoms.tzi.de: Modification: Layout-in-Row --> Text can be aligned into middle, top or bottom align in each line, Text can be aligned by the measurements of a source element (e.g. an image) in each line, Text can be aligned by a fixed pixel value in each line.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
Lays out elements the same way as text area positions words: putting them in one line and going to next line when there is no space for new word.
copyright: Maxim Kachurovskiy http://cookbooks.adobe.com/post_Horizontal_Multiline_Layout-17807.html
Code is modified by Jan Kuester, University of bremen jank87

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Basic class which automatically loads an image from url and catches errors as well as allows a dynamic adding or removing of eventlisteners.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Basic class which automatically loads an image from url and catches errors as well as allows a dynamic adding or removing of eventlisteners. Be aware, that it requires the data as a base64 string.

apiParam.apiDesc: the url to the script which loads the image
the path parameter passed to the url via POST
for debugging purposes, navigates to the url of the script

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: Constructor. Requires an url and a relative path to the image file. Will automatically loads the image as a base64 string and decodes it to an image source.

apiOperation.shortdesc: sets the debug value to the desired value true or fals

apiParam.apiDesc: the new value for the components debugmode

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: sets the debug value to the desired value true or fals

apiClassifier.shortdesc: An extended Button class, implementing the minimum criteria for linking to other objects and removeAllEventListeners function.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
An extended Button class, implementing the minimum criteria for linking to other objects and removeAllEventListeners function.
Most buttons in this Application will extend this

apiValue.shortdesc: get the reference to the linked object

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: get the reference to the linked object

apiValue.shortdesc: gets a reference to a linked visible object

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: gets a reference to a linked visible object

apiClassifier.shortdesc: This Class contains a set of static functions which will be called by any class in the project.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: This Class contains a set of static functions which will be called by any class in the project. Its a kind of collection of generic functions.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Function for Debugging

asCustoms.returns: A boolean value true if object exists.

apiParam.apiDesc: Can be any object, class whatever, important: Classpath needed!

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Function for Debugging

apiOperation.shortdesc: Provides a smooth fade out for all now-running sound files.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Provides a smooth fade out for all now-running sound files.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Can make display components visible or invisible.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Can make display components visible or invisible.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Provides a tween animation for resizing Display Objects.

apiParam.apiDesc: The object which needs to be resized. (important: obj must be a view component)
The desired width of the object
Describes in which way the object will be resized. Options: smaller bigger mirror smallerToZero

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Provides a tween animation for resizing Display Objects.

apiOperation.shortdesc: This animation tween is used to fade in and out but will only work on components wihtout children whose alpha value is used between 0 and 1.

apiParam.apiDesc: The Object which will be faded. Important is, that you only use Display Objects ().
the type of the tween animation

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: This animation tween is used to fade in and out but will only work on components wihtout children whose alpha value is used between 0 and 1. This would cause that those values will be manipulated as well! The components will loose their smooth gradient fashioned look. So be careful if you use this method.

apiValue.shortdesc: for resizeX method

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: for resizeX method

apiValue.shortdesc: Allows a static class to dispatch Events dynamically.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Allows a static class to dispatch Events dynamically.

apiValue.shortdesc: Pointer on multiple Object to use within a method of this class.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Pointer on multiple Object to use within a method of this class.

apiValue.shortdesc: Pointer on a single Object to use within multple methods (especially event driven methods).

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Pointer on a single Object to use within multple methods (especially event driven methods).

apiConstructor.shortdesc: A collection of static functions, calculating things you might need somewhere.

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: A collection of static functions, calculating things you might need somewhere.

apiOperation.shortdesc: This is a full working shuffle function.

apiParam.apiDesc: the width of the current element, which will be compared with the others
the height of the current element, which will be compared with the others
the maxwidth of the elements target container
the maxheight of the elements targetcontainer
the array of all elements to compare with
the maximum amount of steps in the compare loop. assume there are only a few elements with a position set before, so the loop breaks at those who still have not obtained a position.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: This is a full working shuffle function. It auto-increases the y-bounds, if there is no more possible placement of an element. The max effort is n, before the bounds will increase.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Square to Square hit test working by exclusion, which is more performant for the case, that usually there would be no collision.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Square to Square hit test working by exclusion, which is more performant for the case, that usually there would be no collision.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A utility class to decode a Base64 encoded String to a ByteArray.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: A utility class to decode a Base64 encoded String to a ByteArray. Extends Shared.EventDispatcher to dispatch and remove events dynamically

apiOperation.shortdesc: Decodes a Base64 encoded String and adds the result to an internal buffer.

apiParam.apiDesc: The Base64 encoded String to decode.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Decodes a Base64 encoded String and adds the result to an internal buffer. Subsequent calls to this method add on to the internal buffer. After all data have been encoded, call toByteArray() to obtain a decoded flash.utils.ByteArray.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Clears all buffers and resets the decoder to its initial state.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Clears all buffers and resets the decoder to its initial state.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns the current buffer as a decoded flash.utils.ByteArray.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns the current buffer as a decoded flash.utils.ByteArray. Note that calling this method also clears the buffer and resets the decoder to its initial state.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: An event class for passing session related values via event.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: An event class for passing session related values via event. Especially useful if you want to avoid to code this into an interface (and therefore into all other module classes).

apiConstructor.shortdesc: Constructor, calls superclass and passes parameters.

apiParam.apiDesc: the passed user id
the id of the actual item, used to determine the successor item
the timestamp needed for writing the files on the server in order to the actual time
the chosen level of the testcollection
the chosen dimension of the testcollection
determines if the following module is an item, if true, the next module should be an item AND the item id to load will be dtermined by _itemString
contains the updated item xml (after an item was completed). ready to be sent to the server

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: Constructor, calls superclass and passes parameters.

apiValue.shortdesc: Declares the state of being ready to unload.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Declares the state of being ready to unload. Related to any module.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: This class overrides the eventdispatcher to allow a removal of all eventListeners of an Object.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: This class overrides the eventdispatcher to allow a removal of all eventListeners of an Object. Idea and concept by Justin Shacklette, Copyright holds Justin Shacklette www.saturnboy.com

apiOperation.shortdesc: Calls Security.allowDomain() for the SWF associated with this IFlexModuleFactory plus all the SWFs assocatiated with RSLs preLoaded by this IFlexModuleFactory.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Calls Security.allowInsecureDomain() for the SWF associated with this IFlexModuleFactory plus all the SWFs assocatiated with RSLs preLoaded by this IFlexModuleFactory.

apiValue.shortdesc: The RSLs loaded by this system manager before the application starts.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The RSLs loaded by this system manager before the application starts. RSLs loaded by the application are not included in this list.

apiValue.shortdesc: Represents the root url on the server.

Represents the root url on the server. It must be a realtive path to the root directory of this application and will be combined with other paths to load specific data or scripts
Example: http://mydomain.subdomain.com/apps/thisapp/
